page.title: 10LARKHALL EMPLOYMENT
page.content: THE TOTAL NUMBER OF PEOPLE UNEMPLOYED IN THE AREAS ABOVE OF LANARKSHIRE IS 2153 AND THAT MEANS THAT 25.9% OF THE TOTAL POPULATION IN THESE AREAS OF LANARKSHIRE ARE UNEMPLOYED.ALL TYPES OF PEOPLE ARE AFFECTED BY UNEMPLOYMENT FROM MANAGERS OF LARGE FIRMS THROUGH TO UNSKILLLED WORKERS ON THE SHOP FLOOR.THE PEOPLE WHO FIND IT MOST DIFFICULT TO FIND NEW JOBS ARE THOSE PEOPLE WHO DO NOT HAVE ANY SPECIFIC SKILLS e.g LABOURERS,DRIVERS ETC.IN THE FUTURE THE MOST PROMISING OPPORTUNITES FOR EMPLOYMENT IN LARKHALL A NEW FINE FARE STORE OPENING IN LARKHALL AND THIS IS SCHEDULED TO OPEN IN 1986.HOWEVER,NO OTHER NEW COMPANIES ARE PLANNING TO OPEN IN LARKHALL AT THE PRESENT TIME.
